info.author: Daniel Arbuckle
info.description:
Uses a Python metaclass to implement
        preconditions, postconditions and invarients. The contracts can
        be enabled or disabled on either a per module or per class
        basis.  When contracts are not enabled for a particular class,
        they impose no execution time overhead at all on it.
info.name: PyDBC
info.html_description:
Uses a Python metaclass to implement
preconditions, postconditions and invarients. The contracts can be enabled or disabled on either a per module or per class basis. When contracts are not enabled for a particular class, they impose no execution time overhead at all on it.
